name: 40Hex
topic: Phreaking, hacking, and early virus development
impact: One of the first underground hacker zines tied to the Legion of Doom (LoD) and the Masters of Deception (MoD); helped shape hacker scene identity during the early '90s.
description: An underground electronic magazine focusing on phone systems, hacking techniques, and discussions of the hacker underground culture.
essential: Captures the raw, rebellious voice of the early hacker underground and provides a snapshot of pre-commercial internet hacking culture.
inside: Phreaking guides, modem and BBS hacking tutorials, virus info, and editorials about hacker ethics and rivalries.
